TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_balud, title = balud, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/balud} }

S.FORM: balud balud han ni Kacaw ku kasuy. siwkay nu balucu' pasiketay tu tuutuud , u lait ku sapasiketay. kyu kapah mikap malima. caay katahkal ku ilabuay a tuutuud saca aadupan. tinaku a kamu baludan baludan nu misaydang kiya mabusukay a tatama. baluden baluden ku balucu' nu niyazu' kiya icelang ku kamu! mabalud mibalud mabalud tu ku nisapudan nu maku a tudem. nibaludan mibalud kita tu nipenenan i buyu'. sabalud sabalud ku masay tu kasuy. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
